infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Onco Health Mart uses your location to detect your address and provide accurate delivery services while the app is in use.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Onco Health Mart uses your location to detect your address and provide consistent delivery updates, even when the app is running in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Onco Health Mart uses your location to detect your address and ensure accurate delivery, whether the app is in use or running in the background.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Onco Health Mart uses your camera to allow you to take and upload photos of prescriptions or other documents directly from the app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Onco Health Mart uses your photo gallery so you can upload images or prescriptions saved on your device for order processing.
